item.description:
Come join us at G.I.V.E. so that you can:

  • Enjoy delicious appetizers and great music at Alibi Lounge.
  • Meet other people who care deeply about global health.
  • Raise awareness about the need to make effective vaccines readily available to the global community.
  • Have fun while raising money for a great cause!

 

 

 

 

G.I.V.E. (short for Global health Initiatives and Vaccines Event) will be held on Sunday, May 8th, from 7 to 10 PM at the Alibi lounge (at the Liberty Hotel at 215 Charles St. Boston, MA), and will feature music and appetizers. It will be a great chance for people who are passionate about global health to talk about some of the issues we face in trying to improve healthcare around the world.

All proceeds from this event will go to help provide hepatitis B vaccines to healthcare workers in Haiti.

 

Info About Tickets

You can easily get ticket by donating $15. In order to avoid any confusions, all donations will be made through the Mass General Website.Here are the steps to get a ticket:

1) Go To  http://advancingcures.org/event

2) Click on "Reserve Tickets Here"

3) In the "Donation Information" Section mark "other" and enter  $15  in the empty square.

4) Make sure the Designation is Vaccine and Immunotherapy Center at Mass General

5) In the next section select "One time Gift"

6) Enter you Information

7) At the bottom of the page select "Send me a notification of my gift"

  The email notification will be your ticket.

 

If you have any question you can email me at

JNEZIVAR@partners.org
item.why: *Enjoy delicious appetizers and great music *Meet other people who care deeply about global health *Raise awareness about the need to make effective vaccines readily available to the global community *Have fun while raising money for a great cause
item.name: First Annual G.I.V.E.
